Welcome To The Code Challenge!

Below are the lessons that you can use to help you solve the challenges. If you already know programming, feel free to attempt the challenges immediately, or skip to any lesson you like. All practice sets and code blocks inside each lesson are optional. The only thing Marcy will judge is the final application challenge.
